name: Stunted DX
description:
Stunted DX is an endless runner that ends starring Ed, a struggling stuntman working on the latest direct-to-dvd action flick Box Trouble in Little China. While the camera's rolling Ed must keep running forward and avoid injury from obstacles and other stuntmen. If Ed does get hurt he can take opt to take a break backstage and regain some health at craft services; but don't take too long or there will be consequences! The less time Ed spends running the less money he earns, and he'll need that cash to pay off all his medical bills!

This is an improved re-release of the original TOJam version.
